name: Neon Serverless Postgres
description: Integrate with Neon Serverless Postgres to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Projects
tools.description: List all Neon projects accessible to the authenticated user. Returns project names, IDs, regions, and creation dates.

tools.name: Get Project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Neon project by its ID.

tools.name: List Branches
tools.description: List branches in a Neon project. Returns branch names, IDs, parent info, and timestamps.

tools.name: Create Branch
tools.description: Create a new branch in a Neon project. Optionally specify a parent branch and endpoint configuration.

tools.name: List Endpoints
tools.description: List compute endpoints in a Neon project. Returns endpoint IDs, hosts, branch associations, and status.
